title: One Piece Movie 8: The Desert Princess and the Pirates
alternative_title: One Piece Movie 8: Episode of Alabasta - Sabaku no Oujo to Kaizoku-tachi, 劇場版ワンピース エピソードオブアラバスタ 砂漠の王女と海賊たち
description: A complete re-telling of the Alabaster Arc from One Piece TV series. Luffy and his pirate crew come to rescue a land in the midst of a civil war, due to a powerful devil fruit user.
